name: passwordHash
description: User's password, hashed following the good practices. See this site for more information on hashing. Hidden.

name: admin
description: Wether the user is admin or not. Might be updated in the future, if we need more than just 2 levels of rights. Can not be updated through the Update user endpoint. Hidden.

name: verificationToken
description: Token used to authenticate users on the API calls. Unique. Can not be updated through the Update user endpoint, see the Authentication documentation. Hidden.

name: savedCityTours
description: List of saved city tours for a user.

name: savedParameters
description: Parameters used on the app WIP.

name: cookies
description: Saved devices where a user shall not be asked his credentials. Hidden.
